JOB DESCRIPTION: Senior Software Engineer

COMPANY: TechCorp Inc.
LOCATION: San Francisco, CA (Remote Optional)
TYPE: Full-time

ABOUT THE ROLE
We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our growing engineering team. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining scalable web applications that serve millions of users.

REQUIRED SKILLS (Core)
- 5+ years of experience in software development
- Strong proficiency in JavaScript and TypeScript
- Experience with React or Vue.js frontend frameworks
- Backend development with Node.js and Express
- Database experience with MongoDB or PostgreSQL
- Experience with REST APIs and GraphQL
- Git version control
- AWS or cloud platform experience

PREFERRED SKILLS (Optional)
- Docker and Kubernetes experience
- CI/CD pipeline setup and maintenance
- Experience with microservices architecture
- Redis caching experience
- Python or Java experience
- MongoDB certification
- AWS certification

RESPONSIBILITIES
- Design and implement new features and systems
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams
- Mentor junior developers
- Participate in code reviews
- Contribute to technical documentation

BENEFITS
- Competitive salary
- Health insurance
- 401(k) matching
- Remote work flexibility
- Professional development budget
